column4: i have a freind trying to connect to my pc thru ftp .. he's using cute ftp for windows what address should he connect to ? my ip ?
how do i check if my ftp is running ?
Are you behind a NAT:ed router? Firewall?
yes a wifi router but my pc is wired in
Look into port forwarding.
port forwarding ??
Yes.
what are good ftp software for ubuntu ?
Off the top off my head I'd recommend proftpd.
could you name some more .. i installed one a few days ago but forgot what it was called
thing is i donno if its running and how to check .. it worked when i first installed it
None of them are going to work unless you set up port forwarding... Did you look into it or are you just ignoring that advice? ;)
googled it but really confused as im a noob
Basically, access your router and forward an external port to an internal one.
can i do that by connecting to the router thru my browser ?
Yes.
would you like to walk me thru it ?
No I would not. :P But check out http://portforward.com/
my netgear router isnt on that list
I doubt it. What router is it?
NETGEAR WNR854T
Alright, well, take a look at some of the other Netgear guides (another WNR perhaps?), and see if they help you out? Quite easy to draw parallels.
already on it
